text: Fernando Ignacio Huergo Tonnelier was a fencer from Argentina. Huergo competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born on 31 July 1908 and died on 3 April 1995.Fernando Huergo == References == Category:1908 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Argentine fencers Category:Olympians for Argentina Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Fernando Huergo
